name: Jane Creighton
bio: Jane Creighton is a poet and creative nonfiction writer.  Her work has been published in the journals Ploughshares and Gulf Coast, as well as in the anthologies The Edinburgh Companion to Twentieth Century British; American War Literature; Still Seeking and Attitude: Critical Reflections on the Work of June Jordan; and Close to the Bone: Memoirs of Hurt, Rage, and Desire. She is professor of English at the University of Houston—Downtown, where she also serves as the director of the Cultural Enrichment Center.
